actions: Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and cools the Blood.
Relieves toxicity, expels Wind, dries Dampness and alleviates pain and itching topically.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat and reduces swelling topically.
Expels toxins, generates flesh, kills parasites, absorbs, Dampness, promotes healing and stops itch and stops itch topically.

notes: Steep the ingredients in 0.5 liter of vinegar in an airtight glass container for five days. Shake the container once daily. Rub the liquid on the wart 3-5 times/day. The wart should drop off in 7-10 days.
